title: weex-toolkit安装时报错

comments.body:
不建议使用cnpm安装 最近貌似cnpm有问题 
使用npm安装吧 如果嫌慢 可以加上--registry=http://registry.npm.taobao.org 效果是跟cnpm一样的

body:

"value, because it is completely inaccessible except through\\nthe `.increment` method. And if the `.increment` method were not\\navailable, it would be as if no `secret` variable had ever been declared,\\nas far as you could tell.\\n\\nThis style breaks down as soon as you want to inherit methods from the\\nprototype of a class:\\n```js\\nfunction MyClass(secret) {\\n    this.secret = secret;\\n}\\n\\nMyClass.prototype.increment = function() {\\n    return ++this.secret;\\n};\\n```\\nThe only way to communicate between the"), GET https://registry.npm.taobao.org/private/%3E%3D0.1.6%20%3C0.2.0 200 (connected: true, keepalive socket: true, agent status: {"createSocketCount":28,"closeSocketCount":8,"errorSocketCount":0,"timeoutSocketCount":2,"requestCount":1310,"freeSockets":{"cdn.npm.taobao.org:443:::::::true:":6},"sockets":{"registry.npm.taobao.org:443:::::::true:":10,"cdn.npm.taobao.org:443:::::::true:":4},"requests":{"registry.npm.taobao.org:443:::::::true:":71}})
